title: Beautifully & Cozy ~ 1 bedroom & 1 Bathroom
posting_body: Beautifully & Cozy renovated 1 bedroom apartment on the 2nd floor in the great Atlanta .
Heat, water, plowing, and mowing included.
hall, living and dining area with exposed brick.
LARGE Master Bedroom has a walk in closet.
Full bath with vanity .Spacious
Living Room with a large windows allowing for natural lighting.
Neutral colors throughout, with new wood floors water heater, roof and HVAC.
Cyber Center, Bossier Parish Community Boardwalk, downtown Shreveport and Bossier, area lakes & casinos, great schools and the best shopping and dining the area offer.
Surrounded by lovely neighbors, this property is also located a short distance from the Eigenline Avenue public transportation system, as well as offers street parking to those with cars.
Tile and vinyl "wood" floors.
Good closet space.
Washer & Dryer included.
The fireplace is for looks only.

Recien remodelado Cuarto privado en renta por $600.00 al mes (600 de deposito) propia entrada,patio, propio bano completo( el bano no es compartido),gabinetes para despensa microondas y Nuevo refrijerador pequeno incluido.
Billes incluidos.
Localisado en la ciudad de highland norte cercas del freeway 210 ideal para una pareja o una persona buscando algo tranquilo, seguro, en una communidad callada.
No mascotas, no Fumadores.
Tile and hardwood flooring stove and refrigerator.
Gas heat and hot water.
Off-street parking, quiet and secure living.
$650.00 rent, plus your utilities.
First, last and security deposit required, One Year Lease Worcester, No Dogs, No brokers.
Text me if interested
